member.name: T:PetaPoco.Database
member.summary: The main PetaPoco Database class. You can either use this class directly, or derive from it.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.#ctor(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Construct a database using a supplied IDbConnection
member.param: The IDbConnection to use
member.remarks: The supplied IDbConnection will not be closed/disposed by PetaPoco - that remains the responsibility of the caller.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Construct a database using a supplied connections string and optionally a provider name
member.param: The DB connection string
The name of the DB provider to use
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically close and dispose any connections it creates.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.#ctor(System.String,System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory)
member.summary: Construct a Database using a supplied connection string and a DbProviderFactory
member.param: The connection string to use
The DbProviderFactory to use for instantiating IDbConnection's

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct a Database using a supplied connectionString Name. The actual connection string and provider will be read from app/web.config.
member.param: The name of the connection

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.CommonConstruct
member.summary: Provides common initialization for the various constructors

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Dispose
member.summary: Automatically close one open shared connection

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OpenSharedConnection
member.summary: Open a connection that will be used for all subsequent queries.
member.remarks: Calls to Open/CloseSharedConnection are reference counted and should be balanced

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.CloseSharedConnection
member.summary: Releases the shared connection

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.GetTransaction
member.summary: Starts or continues a transaction.
member.returns: An ITransaction reference that must be Completed or disposed

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OnBeginTransaction
member.summary: Called when a transaction starts. Overridden by the T4 template generated database classes to ensure the same DB instance is used throughout the transaction.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OnEndTransaction
member.summary: Called when a transaction ends.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Starts a transaction scope, see GetTransaction() for recommended usage

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.CleanupTransaction
member.summary: Internal helper to cleanup transaction

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.AbortTransaction
member.summary: Aborts the entire outer most transaction scope
member.remarks: Called automatically by Transaction.Dispose() if the transaction wasn't completed.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.CompleteTransaction
member.summary: Marks the current transaction scope as complete.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.AddParam(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.Object,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Add a parameter to a DB command
member.param: A reference to the IDbCommand to which the parameter is to be added
The value to assign to the parameter
Optional, a reference to the property info of the POCO property from which the value is coming.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OnException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Called if an exception occurs during processing of a DB operation. Override to provide custom logging/handling.
member.param: The exception instance
member.returns: True to re-throw the exception, false to suppress it

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OnConnectionOpened(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Called when DB connection opened
member.param: The newly opened IDbConnection
member.returns: The same or a replacement IDbConnection
member.remarks: Override this method to provide custom logging of opening connection, or to provide a proxy IDbConnection.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OnConnectionClosing(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Called when DB connection closed
member.param: The soon to be closed IDBConnection

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OnExecutingCommand(System.Data.IDbCommand)
member.summary: Called just before an DB command is executed
member.param: The command to be executed
member.remarks: Override this method to provide custom logging of commands and/or modification of the IDbCommand before it's executed

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.OnExecutedCommand(System.Data.IDbCommand)
member.summary: Called on completion of command execution
member.param: The IDbCommand that finished executing

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Execute(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a non-query command
member.param: The SQL statement to execute
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL
member.returns: The number of rows affected

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Execute(PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Executes a non-query command
member.param: An SQL builder object representing the query and it's arguments
member.returns: The number of rows affected

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.ExecuteScalar``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a query and return the first column of the first row in the result set.
member.typeparam: The type that the result value should be cast to
member.param: The SQL query to execute
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL
member.returns: The scalar value cast to T

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.ExecuteScalar``1(PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Executes a query and return the first column of the first row in the result set.
member.typeparam: The type that the result value should be cast to
member.param: An SQL builder object representing the query and it's arguments
member.returns: The scalar value cast to T

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Fetch``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Runs a query and returns the result set as a typed list
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The SQL query to execute
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL
member.returns: A List holding the results of the query

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Fetch``1(PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Runs a query and returns the result set as a typed list
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: An SQL builder object representing the query and it's arguments
member.returns: A List holding the results of the query

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.BuildPageQueries``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.String,System.Object[]@,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Starting with a regular SELECT statement, derives the SQL statements required to query a DB for a page of records and the total number of records
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The number of rows to skip before the start of the page
The number of rows in the page
The original SQL select statement
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL
Outputs the SQL statement to query for the total number of matching rows
Outputs the SQL statement to retrieve a single page of matching rows

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Page``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.String,System.Object[],System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a page of records and the total number of available records
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The 1 based page number to retrieve
The number of records per page
The SQL to retrieve the total number of records
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the sqlCount statement
The SQL To retrieve a single page of results
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the sqlPage statement
member.returns: A Page of results
member.remarks: This method allows separate SQL statements to be explicitly provided for the two parts of the page query. The page and itemsPerPage parameters are not used directly and are used simply to populate the returned Page object.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Page``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a page of records and the total number of available records
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The 1 based page number to retrieve
The number of records per page
The base SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: A Page of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified page. It will also execute a second query to retrieve the total number of records in the result set.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Page``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Retrieves a page of records and the total number of available records
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The 1 based page number to retrieve
The number of records per page
An SQL builder object representing the base SQL query and it's arguments
member.returns: A Page of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified page. It will also execute a second query to retrieve the total number of records in the result set.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Page``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,PetaPoco.Sql,PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Retrieves a page of records and the total number of available records
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The 1 based page number to retrieve
The number of records per page
An SQL builder object representing the SQL to retrieve the total number of records
An SQL builder object representing the SQL to retrieve a single page of results
member.returns: A Page of results
member.remarks: This method allows separate SQL statements to be explicitly provided for the two parts of the page query. The page and itemsPerPage parameters are not used directly and are used simply to populate the returned Page object.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Fetch``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a page of records (without the total count)
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The 1 based page number to retrieve
The number of records per page
The base SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: A List of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified page.

member.summary: Retrieves a page of records (without the total count)
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The 1 based page number to retrieve
The number of records per page
An SQL builder object representing the base SQL query and it's arguments
member.returns: A List of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified page.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.SkipTake``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a range of records from result set
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The number of rows at the start of the result set to skip over
The number of rows to retrieve
The base SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: A List of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified range.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.SkipTake``1(System.Int64,System.Int64,PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Retrieves a range of records from result set
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The number of rows at the start of the result set to skip over
The number of rows to retrieve
An SQL builder object representing the base SQL query and it's arguments
member.returns: A List of results
member.remarks: PetaPoco will automatically modify the supplied SELECT statement to only retrieve the records for the specified range.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Query``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Runs an SQL query, returning the results as an IEnumerable collection
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: An enumerable collection of result records
member.remarks: For some DB providers, care should be taken to not start a new Query before finishing with and disposing the previous one. In cases where this is an issue, consider using Fetch which returns the results as a List rather than an IEnumerable.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Query``1(PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Runs an SQL query, returning the results as an IEnumerable collection
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: An SQL builder object representing the base SQL query and it's arguments
member.returns: An enumerable collection of result records
member.remarks: For some DB providers, care should be taken to not start a new Query before finishing with and disposing the previous one. In cases where this is an issue, consider using Fetch which returns the results as a List rather than an IEnumerable.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Exists``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Checks for the existance of a row matching the specified condition
member.typeparam: The Type representing the table being queried
member.param: The SQL expression to be tested for (ie: the WHERE expression)
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: True if a record matching the condition is found.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Exists``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks for the existance of a row with the specified primary key value.
member.typeparam: The Type representing the table being queried
member.param: The primary key value to look for
member.returns: True if a record with the specified primary key value exists.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Single``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the record with the specified primary key value
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The primary key value of the record to fetch
member.returns: The single record matching the specified primary key value
member.remarks: Throws an exception if there are zero or more than one record with the specified primary key value.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.SingleOrDefault``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the record with the specified primary key value, or the default value if not found
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The primary key value of the record to fetch
member.returns: The single record matching the specified primary key value
member.remarks: If there are no records with the specified primary key value, default(T) (typically null) is returned.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Single``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Runs a query that should always return a single row.
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: The single record matching the specified primary key value
member.remarks: Throws an exception if there are zero or more than one matching record

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.SingleOrDefault``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Runs a query that should always return either a single row, or no rows
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: The single record matching the specified primary key value, or default(T) if no matching rows

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.First``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Runs a query that should always return at least one return
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: The first record in the result set

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.FirstOrDefault``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Runs a query and returns the first record, or the default value if no matching records
member.typeparam: The Type representing a row in the result set
member.param: The SQL query
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL statement
member.returns: The first record in the result set, or default(T) if no matching rows

member.summary: Runs a query that should always return a single row.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Insert(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Performs an SQL Insert
member.param: The name of the table to insert into
The name of the primary key column of the table
The POCO object that specifies the column values to be inserted
member.returns: The auto allocated primary key of the new record

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Insert(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object)
member.summary: Performs an SQL Insert
member.param: The name of the table to insert into
The name of the primary key column of the table
True if the primary key is automatically allocated by the DB
The POCO object that specifies the column values to be inserted
member.returns: The auto allocated primary key of the new record, or null for non-auto-increment tables
member.remarks: Inserts a poco into a table. If the poco has a property with the same name as the primary key the id of the new record is assigned to it. Either way, the new id is returned.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.Insert(System.Object)
member.summary: Performs an SQL Insert
member.param: The POCO object that specifies the column values to be inserted
member.returns: The auto allocated primary key of the new record, or null for non-auto-increment tables
member.remarks: The name of the table, it's primary key and whether it's an auto-allocated primary key are retrieved from the POCO's attributes

The primary key of the record to be updated

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.IsNew(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Check if a poco represents a new row
member.param: The name of the primary key column
The object instance whose "newness" is to be tested
member.returns: True if the POCO represents a record already in the database
member.remarks: This method simply tests if the POCO's primary key column property has been set to something non-zero.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Database.IsNew(System.Object)
member.summary: Check if a poco represents a new row
member.param: The object instance whose "newness" is to be tested
member.returns: True if the POCO represents a record already in the database
member.remarks: This method simply tests if the POCO's primary key column property has been set to something non-zero.

member.summary: Formats the contents of a DB command for display

member.summary: Formats an SQL query and it's arguments for display

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.KeepConnectionAlive
member.summary: When set to true the first opened connection is kept alive until this object is disposed

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.Connection
member.summary: Provides access to the currently open shared connection (or null if none)

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.LastSQL
member.summary: Retrieves the SQL of the last executed statement

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.LastArgs
member.summary: Retrieves the arguments to the last execute statement

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.LastCommand
member.summary: Returns a formatted string describing the last executed SQL statement and it's argument values

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.EnableAutoSelect
member.summary: When set to true, PetaPoco will automatically create the "SELECT columns" part of any query that looks like it needs it

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.EnableNamedParams
member.summary: When set to true, parameters can be named ?myparam and populated from properties of the passed in argument values.

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Sets the timeout value for all SQL statements.

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Database.OneTimeCommandTimeout
member.summary: Sets the timeout value for the next (and only next) SQL statement

member.name: T:PetaPoco.ColumnAttribute
member.summary: For explicit poco properties, marks the property as a column and optionally supplies the DB column name.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.ExplicitColumnsAttribute
member.summary: Poco classes marked with the Explicit attribute require all column properties to be marked with the Column attribute

member.name: T:PetaPoco.IgnoreAttribute
member.summary: Use the Ignore attribute on POCO class properties that shouldn't be mapped by PetaPoco.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.PrimaryKeyAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the primary key column of a poco class, whether the column is auto incrementing and the sequence name for Oracle sequence columns.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.ResultColumnAttribute
member.summary: Marks a poco property as a result only column that is populated in queries but not used for updates or inserts.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.TableNameAttribute
member.summary: Sets the DB table name to be used for a Poco class.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.AnsiString
member.summary: Wrap strings in an instance of this class to force use of DBType.AnsiString

member.name: M:PetaPoco.AnsiString.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an AnsiString
member.param: The C# string to be converted to ANSI before being passed to the DB

member.name: P:PetaPoco.AnsiString.Value
member.summary: The string value

member.name: T:PetaPoco.ColumnInfo
member.summary: Hold information about a column in the database.
member.remarks: Typically ColumnInfo is automatically populated from the attributes on a POCO object and it's properties. It can however also be returned from the IMapper interface to provide your owning bindings between the DB and your POCOs.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.ColumnInfo.FromProperty(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates and populates a ColumnInfo from the attributes of a POCO property.
member.param: The property whose column info is required
member.returns: A ColumnInfo instance

member.name: P:PetaPoco.ColumnInfo.ColumnName
member.summary: The SQL name of the column

member.name: P:PetaPoco.ColumnInfo.ResultColumn
member.summary: True if this column returns a calculated value from the database and shouldn't be used in Insert and Update operations.

member.name: P:PetaPoco.ColumnInfo.ForceToUtc
member.summary: True if time and date values returned through this column should be forced to UTC DateTimeKind. (no conversion is applied - the Kind of the DateTime property is simply set to DateTimeKind.Utc instead of DateTimeKind.Unknown.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.IMapper
member.summary: IMapper provides a way to hook into PetaPoco's Database to POCO mapping mechanism to either customize or completely replace it.
member.remarks: To use this functionality, instantiate a class that implements IMapper and then pass it to PetaPoco through the static method Mappers.Register()

member.name: M:PetaPoco.IMapper.GetTableInfo(System.Type)
member.summary: Get information about the table associated with a POCO class
member.returns: A TableInfo instance
member.remarks: This method must return a valid TableInfo. To create a TableInfo from a POCO's attributes, use TableInfo.FromPoco

member.name: M:PetaPoco.IMapper.GetColumnInfo(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Get information about the column associated with a property of a POCO
member.param: The PropertyInfo of the property being queried
member.returns: A reference to a ColumnInfo instance, or null to ignore this property
member.remarks: To create a ColumnInfo from a property's attributes, use PropertyInfo.FromProperty

member.name: M:PetaPoco.IMapper.GetFromDbConverter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Type)
member.summary: Supply a function to convert a database value to the correct property value
member.param: The target property
The type of data returned by the DB
member.returns: A Func that can do the conversion, or null for no conversion

member.name: M:PetaPoco.IMapper.GetToDbConverter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Supply a function to convert a property value into a database value
member.param: The property to be converted
member.returns: A Func that can do the conversion
member.remarks: This conversion is only used for converting values from POCO's that are being Inserted or Updated. Conversion is not available for parameter values passed directly to queries.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.Mappers
member.summary: This static manages registation of IMapper instances with PetaPoco

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Mappers.Register(System.Reflection.Assembly,PetaPoco.IMapper)
member.summary: Registers a mapper for all types in a specific assembly
member.param: The assembly whose types are to be managed by this mapper
The IMapper implementation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Mappers.Register(System.Type,PetaPoco.IMapper)
member.summary: Registers a mapper for a single POCO type
member.param: The type to be managed by this mapper
The IMapper implementation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Mappers.Revoke(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Remove all mappers for all types in a specific assembly
member.param: The assembly whose mappers are to be revoked

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Mappers.Revoke(System.Type)
member.summary: Remove the mapper for a specific type
member.param: The type whose mapper is to be removed

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Mappers.Revoke(PetaPoco.IMapper)
member.summary: Revoke an instance of a mapper
member.param: The IMapper to be revkoed

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Mappers.GetMapper(System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieve the IMapper implementation to be used for a specified POCO type

member.name: T:PetaPoco.Page`1
member.summary: Holds the results of a paged request.
member.typeparam: The type of Poco in the returned result set

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Page`1.CurrentPage
member.summary: The current page number contained in this page of result set

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Page`1.TotalPages
member.summary: The total number of pages in the full result set

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Page`1.TotalItems
member.summary: The total number of records in the full result set

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Page`1.ItemsPerPage
member.summary: The number of items per page

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Page`1.Items
member.summary: The actual records on this page

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Page`1.Context
member.summary: User property to hold anything.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.Sql
member.summary: A simple helper class for build SQL statements

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.#ctor
member.summary: Default, empty constructor

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.#ctor(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Construct an SQL statement with the supplied SQL and arguments
member.param: The SQL statement or fragment
Arguments to any parameters embedded in the SQL

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.Append(PetaPoco.Sql)
member.summary: Append another SQL builder instance to the right-hand-side of this SQL builder
member.param: A reference to another SQL builder instance
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.Append(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Append an SQL fragement to the right-hand-side of this SQL builder
member.param: The SQL statement or fragment
Arguments to any parameters embedded in the SQL
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.Where(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends an SQL WHERE clause to this SQL builder
member.param: The condition of the WHERE clause
Arguments to any parameters embedded in the supplied SQL
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.OrderBy(System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends an SQL ORDER BY clause to this SQL builder
member.param: A collection of SQL column names to order by
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.From(System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends an SQL FROM clause to this SQL builder
member.param: A collection of table names to be used in the FROM clause
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.GroupBy(System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends an SQL GROUP BY clause to this SQL builder
member.param: A collection of column names to be grouped by
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.InnerJoin(System.String)
member.summary: Appends an SQL INNER JOIN clause to this SQL builder
member.param: The name of the table to join
member.returns: A reference an SqlJoinClause through which the join condition can be specified

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.LeftJoin(System.String)
member.summary: Appends an SQL LEFT JOIN clause to this SQL builder
member.param: The name of the table to join
member.returns: A reference an SqlJoinClause through which the join condition can be specified

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Sql.Builder
member.summary: Instantiate a new SQL Builder object. Weirdly implemented as a property but makes for more elegantly readble fluent style construction of SQL Statements eg: db.Query(Sql.Builder.Append(....))

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Sql.SQL
member.summary: Returns the final SQL statement represented by this builder

member.name: P:PetaPoco.Sql.Arguments
member.summary: Gets the complete, final set of arguments collected by this builder.

member.name: T:PetaPoco.Sql.SqlJoinClause
member.summary: The SqlJoinClause is a simple helper class used in the construction of SQL JOIN statements with the SQL builder

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Sql.SqlJoinClause.On(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends a SQL ON clause after a JOIN statement
member.param: The ON clause to be appended
Arguments to any parameters embedded in the supplied SQL
member.returns: A reference to the parent SQL builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: T:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType
member.summary: Base class for DatabaseType handlers - provides default/common handling for different database engines

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.GetParameterPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the prefix used to delimit parameters in SQL query strings.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.MapParameterValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a supplied C# object value into a value suitable for passing to the database
member.param: The value to convert
member.returns: The converted value

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.PreExecute(System.Data.IDbCommand)
member.summary: Called immediately before a command is executed, allowing for modification of the IDbCommand before it's passed to the database provider

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.BuildPageQuery(System.Int64,System.Int64,PetaPoco.Internal.PagingHelper.SQLParts,System.Object[]@)
member.summary: Builds an SQL query suitable for performing page based queries to the database
member.param: The number of rows that should be skipped by the query
The number of rows that should be retruend by the query
The original SQL query after being parsed into it's component parts
Arguments to any embedded parameters in the SQL query
member.returns: The final SQL query that should be executed.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.GetExistsSql
member.summary: Returns an SQL Statement that can check for the existance of a row in the database.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.EscapeTableName(System.String)
member.summary: Escape a tablename into a suitable format for the associated database provider.
member.param: The name of the table (as specified by the client program, or as attributes on the associated POCO class.
member.returns: The escaped table name

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.EscapeSqlIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: Escape and arbitary SQL identifier into a format suitable for the associated database provider
member.param: The SQL identifier to be escaped
member.returns: The escaped identifier

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.GetAutoIncrementExpression(PetaPoco.TableInfo)
member.summary: Return an SQL expression that can be used to populate the primary key column of an auto-increment column.
member.param: Table info describing the table
member.returns: An SQL expressions
member.remarks: See the Oracle database type for an example of how this method is used.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.GetInsertOutputClause(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an SQL expression that can be used to specify the return value of auto incremented columns.
member.param: The primary key of the row being inserted.
member.returns: An expression describing how to return the new primary key value
member.remarks: See the SQLServer database provider for an example of how this method is used.

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.ExecuteInsert(PetaPoco.Database,System.Data.IDbCommand,System.String)
member.summary: Performs an Insert operation
member.param: The calling Database object
The insert command to be executed
The primary key of the table being inserted into
member.returns: The ID of the newly inserted record

member.name: M:PetaPoco.Internal.DatabaseType.Resolve(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Look at the type and provider name being used and instantiate a suitable DatabaseType instance.
